Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the Family
Reviews.Author: C.Miller
Reviews.Content: I love this TV, the picture is beautiful and it is the right size for me and my family.  Only thing I wish is that it played movies from a flash drive but other than that it is a great addition to your family area.

Reviews.Title: Great tv.
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: So far so good with this TV. I can't complain about anything other than the screen seems to get darker all of a sudden but that could just be me. It has great quality picture. The volume can be turned up very loud which is a plus for me since my last TV could be all the way up and still hard to hear. The audio quality isn't the best, but it isn't terrible. Overall, I am very happy. Great gaming and movie watching TV with lots of options.

Reviews.Title: Great TV But Beware!!
Reviews.Author: Papa Al
Reviews.Content: This TV is great for the $412 I paid for it on Amazon. The picture and sound are good but if you hook up a DVD recorder to record a program a nuisance warning pops up for about 10 seconds that the TV can't find the HDCP signal. I googled it and it seems Intel put a chip in the TV to restrict recording in High Definition.

Reviews.Title: Almost 2 yrs old and still good as new!!
Reviews.Author: astro_mike
Reviews.Content: I am a big fan of Philips brand appliances and this television has not disappointed! It has a GREAT picture for being just 60Hz, far away scenes can appear a tad grainy at times but close ups are extremely CLEAR, true 1080p HD quality and the overall picture quality in general is top notch! The picture quality is even great if your watching tv from the side! This tv also shines when watching blu-ray movies from it with the 3 HDMI outlets it has,  it also has a USB outlet if you want to attach your laptop to it. If you are a budget minded person like me and ditched cable for netflix, you will also enjoy decent (free) digital tv if you add a 10.00 Philips rabbit ears antenna (also available at amazon/Walmart) when you use the auto programming option. The sound is good and loud for me, I usually have it no higher then 40 out of 100 which is fairly loud. I don't know why people need to have such loud volume? Of course I live in a tiny apartment by myself so maybe that's why I don't need it too loud lol. This tv is also an Energy Star rated appliance in case your wondering too. Like I said this tv is still good as new and it's going on 2 years and I am very satisfied and haven't had any problems what so ever with it!

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: jn-baltimore
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints about this TV. Good picture quality, it has a HDMI port on the side to hook up my Roku, and a great price.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: robyn
Reviews.Content: Great purchase! Crisp picture, good sound, and easy to use menu. I shopped around and know that Philips is a good brand. I also like the PC input option. I can use it as a monitor if I want.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Warranty services
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: We ordered this TV on Dec 2nd 2012 and it broke 4 months ago. We have been calling for the Manufacturer’s Warranty since then and there has still been no answer. They asked us for the original receipt. We sent it to them, and still, after many long phone calls, they have not done anything about it. I would suggest, for anyone buying a Philips product, to be very careful, as they do not stand by their products.We even bought the square trade warranty from Amazon, and they haven’t even taken care of the issue either, saying that it is the manufacturer’s responsibility.

Reviews.Title: Not Complaining
Reviews.Author: Tee "trendonite"
Reviews.Content: Purchased on Woot. I would give it four stars if the audio was just slightly better. The remote is also ugly, if you will allow for nitpicking.Otherwise, screen quality is very good, menus are neat, and I am overall happy. I am actually kinda-sorta happy that the audio is medicore because now I have an excuse to buy a soundbar (in an apartment so a full surround sound would be overkill and make my neighbors hate me)

Reviews.Title: Disappointed that it does not have external sound connection (Stero plug)
Reviews.Author: john Morris
Reviews.Content: For the money the tv is okay. Visually, the HD is good, not stunning. If I had to buy again, I would look at Smart TV's first with eternal sound jacks for headphones and easy connections for soundbar or speakers.

Reviews.Title: Horrendous customer service
Reviews.Author: Julian Romeu
Reviews.Content: Dont buy phillips Warranty?... Right...  Buy a POS from Walmart, or better yet a real company like Sony or Samsung

Reviews.Title: Arrived Broken
Reviews.Author: Bryan Lloyd
Reviews.Content: These guys are awesome with customer service. They were easy to get a hold of and help me resolve this issue immediately. They even paid for the shipping costs to return the product. I was also offered a 10% discount which was very generous of them. I just decided that I didn't want to take the risk of going through this same situation again. I don't blame the seller for the broken TV I am sure when it was shipped it was in perfect condition. I guess it should of had a little more padding. The way packages are handle now days you can never be too careful.

Reviews.Title: Great picture for a great price
Reviews.Author: Gregory D Hales
Reviews.Content: Great picture for a great price. We really have enjoyed the HD tv with the PS3 that I got for Christmas. I paid less that $500 for the TV and have seen them for about $100 more than that online.

Reviews.Title: Great Mid-Range TV
Reviews.Author: David B.
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for a room that does not have a lot of tv viewing.  Amazon had it on sale for $370.The picture is fantastic, the sound is more than adequate.  Is it a top of the line TV?  No.  Is it very good?  Yes.  It has 3 HDMI connections, which suffices for my needs.A nice feature would be the ability to play movies from the USB port, but for the money, it does the most important thing.  It shows a great picture for what was a great price.  I have it hooked up to an Apple TV and the picture is every bit as good as my more expensive Samsung.

Reviews.Title: great picture------average audio
Reviews.Author: David Michael Day "D M Day"
Reviews.Content: This is an attractive TV with an excellent picture. Setup is easy.No problems with attaching the stand. Once the TV was connected, the factory settings for both picture and sound seemed as good as any adjustments I attempted. This TV would rate 5 stars if the sound was better. As with most LCD HDTVs the audio is mediocre at best.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy this TV
Reviews.Author: yellat1
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv because I had another Philips in the house and like it!! This tv worked fine for the first 6 months or so then the analog channels went south. Every other tv in the house works fine with no problems. An 8 year old SONY 48" and a 10 year old 46" SHARP. I had the cable co. come out to check my signal and they said there end was fine. I know there is something wrong in the Philips tuner but there service department says its my connection (BULL CRAP) First they told me to get a cable booster now there saying I need to rent a cable box. If this tv had any value I would donate it to charity but I think it would cause me grief that I passed along my problems. Get any other brand and you wont have to deal with there service department. I wish I was smart enough to do a video review because the difference in tvs is like going back 30 years to the antenna connection.Philips 40PFL3706/F7 40-Inch 1080p 60Hz LCD HDTV (Black)

Reviews.Title: Fine except DOA
Reviews.Author: M. Hyman "Artist at large"
Reviews.Content: Pluses:Picture is sharp and clearLots of inputs for component, rgb, hdmi, analogSimple remoteEasy to setupGood warranty repair programCons:Sound quality is so soNo internet connectionArrived deadOverall i would have been perfectly happy with the tv and given it a much better review if it had worked. Instead, after unpacking it i needed to drive an hour to drop it off at a repair store for a warranty repair because the power supply didn't work and hence it wouldn't turn on. The good news is that Philips is easy to reach and covered the repair, but it is the first electronics i have bought in a long time that was completely broken on arrival.

Reviews.Title: very dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Spencer C. Frasier
Reviews.Content: I went out and got this cause I heard it was a decent  tv but after I got it I was dissapointed in the display it  looked ugly compared to the 32 inch vizio hdtv I had  outside it looks nice but the display is inaceptable I coundent even enjoy watching hd cable bluray my ps3 or xbox 360 hd gaming and movies so I took it back and got a 42 inch vizio  led 120 hyz hdtv for the same price and I could twll the difference  save your money and get a vizio  thwy r well made last long and  look and sound good

Reviews.Title: REMOTELY SCREWED!!!
Reviews.Author: HAMMER
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT THIS TV A FEW WEEKS AGO AND ITS FANTASTIC IN TERMS OF PICTURE QUALITY AND RESPONSE BUT THE ONE DRAWBACK IS THAT THE REMOTE NEVER WORKS.YOU LITERALLY HAVE TO WALK UP ON THE TV FOR THE REMOTE TO WORK. I'M SURE A SIMPLE FIX WOULD BE TO JUST GET A UNIVERSAL REMOTE BUT YOU SHOULDN'T HAVE TO WITH A BRAND NEW TV. IF YOU LIKE TO SIT BACK FROM YOUR TV PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS MODEL BECAUSE THE REMOTE WILL CONTINUOUSLY FRUSTRATE YOU.
